mapper.insert: insert into user_tb(username, password, user_email, user_phone_number, user_address, user_pic_url, nickName, user_division, created_at) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{userAddress}, #{userPicUrl}, #{nickName}, #{userDivision}, now());
mapper.select: select * from user_tb u join team_tb t on u.team_id = t.id join region_tb r on t.region_id = r.id join sport_tb s on t.sport_id = s.id where u.id = #{id}
select * from user_tb u left join point_tb p on u.id = p.user_id where u.id = #{id}

SELECT u.nickname, u.user_email, u.user_address, u.user_division, t.team_name, t.team_introduce, t.level, r.region_name, sp.sport_name, rt.reservation_date, rt.start_time, rt.end_time, rt.status, s.space_name FROM user_tb u LEFT JOIN team_tb t ON u.team_id = t.id LEFT JOIN region_tb r ON t.region_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sport_tb sp ON sp.id = t.sport_id LEFT JOIN reservation_tb rt ON rt.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN space_tb s ON s.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{id}
